author: Mines and Geosciences Bureau
name: ftaa-06-2010-1
notes: Financial or Technical Assistance Agreement (FTAA) An Financial or Technical Assistance Agreement may be entered into between a Contractor and the Government for the large-scale exploration, development and utilization of gold, copper, nickel, chromite, lead, zinc and other minerals except for cement raw materials, marble, granite, sand and gravel and construction aggregates. (PH-EITI)
title: Altamina Exploration and Resources, Inc.  - Financial or Technical Assistance Agreement 06-2010-1
